events.title: Cat Adoption Day
events.description: Find your new feline friend at this event.

events.title: Community Gardening
events.description: Join us as we tend to the community edible plants.

events.title: Beach Cleanup
events.description: Help pick up trash along the shore.

events.title: Association Table Mapping
events.description: Saves an association as a table with foreign keys to the tables that are linked by the association.

events.title: Dependent Mapping
events.description: Has one class perform the database mapping for a child class.

events.title: Identity Field
events.description: Saves a database ID field in an object to maintain identity between an in-memory object and a database row.

events.title: Transaction Script
events.description: Organizes business logic by procedures where each procedure handles a single request from the presentation.

events.title: Data Mapper
events.description: A layer of Mappers (473) that moves data between objects and a database while keeping them independent of each other and the mapper itself.

events.title: Row Data Gateway
events.description: An object that acts as a Gateway (466) to a single record in a data source. There is one instance per row.

events.title: Active Record
events.description: An object that wraps a row in a database table or view, encapsulates the database access, and adds domain logic on that data.

events.title: Table Data Gateway
events.description: An object that acts as a Gateway (466) to a database table. One instance handles all the rows in the table.
